name: Christmas Eve Sprint
description:
Help Santa load up his sleigh before he has to deliver his presents. Get close to your friends and family by playing this frantic multiplayer game where all 4 players have to share the keyboard.

Controls

IN BROWSER: Click on the game window once for the inputs to be recognised

Player 1 [red]: UP - W key | DOWN - S key | LEFT - A key | RIGHT - D key

Player 2 [blue]: UP - Up key | DOWN - Down key | LEFT - Left key | RIGHT - Right key

Player 3 [gold]: UP - G key | DOWN - B key | LEFT - V key | RIGHT - N key

Player 4 [silver]: UP - O key | DOWN - L key | LEFT - K key | RIGHT - ; key

Point Values

Toothbrush - 20

Wine Bottle - 50

Book - 100

Headphones - 250

Laptop - 350

TV - 600

Smartphone - 1000

Credits

Game by Carlo Albino

Special Thanks to Alon, Ryen, Jeremie, and Gabriella

Music:

"Pixel adventures". Music by Marcelo Fernandez (http://www.marcelofernandezmusic.com). Licensed under Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International (http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/).
